website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, well-designed bathroom vanity light that is versatile enough for almost any space.
pros: Understated elegance and sleek modern style
Unique saber-style design provides enough light for virtually any space
cons: Some felt the light appears too bright with certain bulbs
A few customers received the wrong screws

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice modern vanity light
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice modern vanity light. Puts out plenty of light depending on the bulbs you use. (I think it should had included bulbs). Found these and they work perfect and are bright. GE Model # LED10S3/5K/96 Internet # 205783755 Store SKU # 1001222947 60W Equivalent Daylight General Purpose LED Bright Stik light bulb (3-Pack)
customer_reviews.author: PHX

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, effective light fixture.
customer_reviews.text: An attractive, effective light fixture. The two 60 Watt T10 light bulb were available at my local hardware store for about $2.50 each. If a clear T10 light bulb is used, it will produce slightly more light than a frosted bulb. Since the glass of the light fixture is itself frosted, the clear bulb is not noticeable nor distracting. Placed above a mirror it provides good light on one's face.
customer_reviews.author: selective buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a contemporary/modern bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of these lights to put along side of and between 2 large bathroom mirrors; will be installing them vertically. They are in keeping with the mid century modern look of my home. Have yet to find bulbs locally, so may have to order them. Update 03/2015- all 3 of my light fixtures are starting to show rust in the chrome finish. Since these are bathroom light fixtures, one would think they'd be coated with something to prevent this from happening. Very disappointing since they were not cheap and will likely need to be replaced within another 1-2 years if I can't clean the rust off of them without ruining the chrome finish.
customer_reviews.author: retromomof2

customer_reviews.title: Simple clean design--C@@L
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lights, good quality. They are just as pictured. The glass tapers toward the ends. The medicine cabinets are 17 1/2"W x 36"H for size reference. Research the bulbs you purchase! The ones I ordered make a weird noise when dimmed, but prob my fault. Overall great, clean, modern light!
customer_reviews.author: LPMal

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and light bulb availability is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The light bulb needed are hard to find that actually work (flicker free LEDs). After my fifth attempt, I found some incandescent bulbs that are flicker free, but are very dim. These lights will be replaced shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Team Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Not UL Listed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why people like these so much. To start off with they sent the wrong screws for the bracket. Second the bracket does not match up with the mud ring. Basically everything needs to be modified to mount to a standard american mud ring. Oh and the ones I got are not UL listed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Bull

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant, gorgeous, well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for placement on either side of my bathroom mirror as part of my bathroom remodel. They are stunning and worth every penny. While they are pictured next to my review box as sideways, I used them lengthwise. They are well made and they look gorgeous. When I needed to look for additional lighting, I wanted more of these but I didn't want to repeat them in other parts of my house. However I think they will look beautiful wherever you place them. I think they are a great value too!
customer_reviews.author: wdgolf

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I could love these lights any more than I do! I have attached a pic of them installed. Beautiful
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice in our newly remodeled bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and modern. Very bright but I suppose that has more to do with the bulbs than the fixture. If you're considering it I think you should just get it! Don't agonize... It's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Arnault

customer_reviews.title: Understated and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fixture. It is not ideal for the space I put it in but since we really liked the look of it we will make it work. If you are looking to get this make sure you have twice the length of one of the shades on each side of the fixture uniterrupted so that you can put the shade on after attaching the really long bulb. Also the bulbs recommended for this give a warm yellow light. I am not sure if there are other options so it does not look like it does in the picture with the white light.
customer_reviews.author: G.S.R

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Exactly what you can get at high end lighting store at a fraction of the price. The real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek
customer_reviews.text: Very cool light fixture. I would recommend purchasing a different style bulb than the T10 incandescent, these bulbs don't give off much light and I installed in a very small bathroom. I bought a CFL compact bulb but it can only be about an 1 1/2 inch wide or it won't fit, most of these bulbs are about 2 inches wide so you will have to do some searching.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Wanta

customer_reviews.title: Replaced old ceiling mount bathroom fixture
customer_reviews.text: I actually hung this from the ceiling to replace an old bathroom light fixture. I couldn't find any fixtures that hung from the ceiling so thought I'd give this a try. It looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Looks good and easy install
customer_reviews.author: Ron G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fixture.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fixture looks great. Not such great value for the price I paid ($100) but it's ok. Rather flimsy. Contemporary feel makes a difference so that's what matters. (Made in China)
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful saber lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my guest room. They are beautiful and were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Janna J.

customer_reviews.title: These fixtures are perfect in every aspect
customer_reviews.text: These fixtures are perfect in every aspect. Strong packaging solved any possible shipping issues. Ease of installation solved any idiot issues. And beauty helped my architect and I look great in front of the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Jacob Bruton

customer_reviews.title: Mid-century clean
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our small mid-century modern bathrooms. Used it above the vanities. Just enough light---- well made and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Rose1376

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern look
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern look. I used the recommended light bulbs and there is nice light, not too bright but still strong enough
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: I put up this light myself and it was easy. It is perfect for a powder room or smaller bathroom. The great design looks good with an oval mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful. We installed it horizontally over the bathroom sink
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful. We installed it horizontally over the bathroom sink.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive fixture and gives ample light for a vanity mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael D Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this. It is exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It is exactly as promised. I would highly recommend this to anyone who wants an elegant bathroom with clean lines.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: OK for small area
customer_reviews.text: With the bulbs recommended it does not give out a lot of light. However, it is adequate for the powder room it is in.
customer_reviews.author: Moses S. Schanfield

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great, I wish there was a label on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great, I wish there was a label on the socket to tell you what bulbs you need.
customer_reviews.author: jason durler

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great and looks really good in our newly remodeled master bath.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very good as a stylish yet economic bathroom upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and but rather over priced for all that it really is; mid-quality construction luminaire. Wouldn't suggest this if high end bathroom lighting was a big factor.
customer_reviews.author: Byrnie

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and simple modern light
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and simple modern light which can be used horizontally or vertically. We used it in our bathrooms and it looks great, and provides enough light.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Put dimmable led 40 watt bulbs in lamps
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Put dimmable led 40 watt bulbs in lamps. Worked great after changing the old dimmer switch to led friendly dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Light fixture was just what I was looking for. The look is contemporary and provides great lighting over my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, well done!
customer_reviews.text: Functional design, good materials, properly assembled, I will buy more of the same and other models in the product line.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Monroe

customer_reviews.title: quality, inexpensive sconce
customer_reviews.text: We used this fixture in my old house as a single fixture in a small bathroom. It hung horizontally over the mirror and there was plenty of light. In our latest house we used 2ea of these Kovacs in each bathroom. The bathrooms are bigger and two fixtures are, again, plenty of light. In this case the fixtures are mounted vertically. This fixture works well both horizontally and vertically. I recommend it all the time and the architect we work with now uses is as a less-expensive, modern option.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Spils

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With These Lights
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect replacement for some cheap lights in the condo we bought. Installation was a breeze and took about 5 minutes per light. The only issue is that we couldn't find a long, linear CFL to fit inside the tube. We ended up using a "corkscrew style" CFL. They work fine, but the light is not as even as we would have liked inside the tube. We tried an LED "corn cob" style light, but it didn't give off enough light. We ordered a 3rd light for the guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected. Has note rusted yet, been four months.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. West

customer_reviews.title: Kovacs lighting
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of it well packaged...but yet to install it. I plan to mount it on our mirror to get the desired effect. Will post pictures later
customer_reviews.author: White Peacock Interiors

customer_reviews.title: These are quality fixtures.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a bathroom I am updating. I put tubular CFL bulbs in the fixtures (one fixture on each side of the vanity mirror, two bulbs per fixture) and there is plenty of light. I would buy these again if I had a place to use them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pahl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Elegant wall light fixture. Easy to install. Gives ample light for a small room, in our case for a small bathroom. Too bad it's not available in a few more finishes.
customer_reviews.author: Crownbach

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item
customer_reviews.text: The warehouse has this item and a pendant lights item # crossed...ordered 3 times wrong item each time. Save yourself the time. Customer service was excellent, but would rather have the correct item the 1st time and not have to test the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: sakdaroc

customer_reviews.title: not a good light for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: this is a very handsome light but it truly was not bright enough to be advertised as a bathroom light. It was also hard to find the bulbs. The 60 watt option has been discontinued and the 40 watt was "mood lighting". I am returning the light.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Geddes

product_meta.title: George Kovacs P5042-077, Saber Glass Wall Vanity Lighting, 2 Light, Chrome
product_meta.description: Modern aesthetics define contemporary design and style. No name has been more synonymous with that than George Kovacs. Contemporary lighting design has been influenced for the past sixty years by George Kovacs and his peers. Our next sixty will be influenced by the same, coupled with a Minka 'mystique'.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 4.75" High, 20" Wide, Extends 4.75", Weight: 1.98 lbs
Finish: Chrome with Cased Etched Opal Glass
Lamping: 2 x 60W T10 Medium (E26) Bulbs (Sold Separately)
Can be mounted Vertically or Horizontally, ETL Listed, Damp Location Rated, Title 17 Compliant
3 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty, Return to Seller for Refund Within 1 Year of Purchase

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
